item.description:
We were rained out last time so we will try this again one last time. If it rains we will head next door to Noir.

It has been a great summer except for the Red Sox season.

Join us for a final summer night at Legal Seafoods in Harvard Square to "Play The Blame Game" (The Owners, The GM, The Manager, The Players, The Injuries, The Beer & Chicken...)

Watch the Sox game if you care.

Enjoy the sounds of the live band on the abutting Noir patio.

People watch at of Harvard Squares finest locations.

Prepare for the Patriots season. 

Natives Team Weatherman Scott says it will probably be a hazy, hot and humid night so we will venture outside to watch the Sox game at Legal Seafoods out door bar and patio at the Charles Hotel in Harvard Square. This is the raw bar at street level visible from the street, not the patio dining area in the courtyard. There are several Televisions at the bar. The bar menu is sufficient for most people. The Red Sox play the Angels at Fenway at 7:10pm and we will watch the game.

We will be either at or around the bar and then move to a round table. Ask the bartenders if you can not find us or are a newbie. All members should wear Red Sox Baseball hats.

Attendance at this is unlimited. Please RSVP and bring guests and other Sox fans. 

Please remember to maintain your own tab or pay cash for your beverage and food and tip your server/bartender when paying your separate food and drink check before leaving.

Go Sox

Red Sox Natives Team
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the bartenders, look for Natives wearing Red Sox Hats
item.name: Play The Blame Game & Watch Sox Game at Legal Seafoods Outdoor Bar
